Articles.Content: Long story short, I was making some placeholder particle effects for a scene in a larger KSP movie when I realized how much my concept and plot would benefit from waiting for .16 before recording/production. I decided that I may as well make the effects look a bit better, so I slapped some of the early effects on a pod and put some music in the background for your enjoyment!

Haha! I was just thinking 'Wow that was awesome... imagine if he added effects for the landing too!' right before my wish came true.

Nice!
I like the EPIC CAMERA SHAKE! And my computer would not like this very much.

I like the EPIC CAMERA SHAKE! And my computer would not like this very much.

I have a quad core i5 at 3.3Ghz along with an ATI 6870 card, it took my system an hour to render all the AE clips after I put the final color correction and adjustments on them with all 4 cores going full speed. I literally couldn\'t do anything else on my computer because I allowed AE to take up all the processing power so even the mouse was moving at about 3fps if not less
just.. wow, post this on nova\'s dev thread !!!!
Not sure about the splashdown, but the reentry looks cool.

just.. wow, post this on nova\'s dev thread !!!!

I second this.
Now I REALLY want reentry effects to come soon. With IVAs on the way, it would be awesome to experience re-entry heat from the inside.

Too......much....awesome......

Seriously, This guy did and amazing job, Can\'t wait until they implement something like this, Probably not in the near future though :\'(
Now the devs know what reentry will look like now!
